description:

UGREEN 4K HDMI Cable 2.0 features TMDS technology to protect the signal against electromagnetic interference, ensure stable data transmission and avoid picture delay or flickering   HDMI ARC Cable With Ethernet: The 4K HDMI Male 2.0 to Male Cable features ARC (Audio Return Channel)function to deliver audio directly from HDMI ARC enabled TV to a soundbar or AV receiver. Plus, the 18Gbps high-speed HDMI 2.0 Cable is Ethernet-enabled and makes it easy for multiple HDMI devices to share an Internet connection. The HDMI ARC Ethernet Lead simplifies the connections and saves lots of cables for you   Work Like A Charm: The 4K UHD HDMI ARC Cable synchronizes video and audio signals and lets you get a stunning picture and audio experience simultaneously. Support both mirror and extend mode, and enable you to operate multitasking even at no Wi-Fi circumstance. The 4K HDMI cable works out of box and requests no driver or software installation. Just plug & play   Enhanced Durability: Built with premium nickle-plated connectors and high-quality nylon braided jacket, this HDMI monitor cable can withstand more frequent bending test without reducing cable flexibility and ensure a longer lifespan   Universal Fit: The HDMI Male to Male ARC Ethernet Cable supports devices of HDMI 2.1/2.0/1.4/1.3 Type A interfaces, like Fire TV, NS Switch, Wii U, MacBook, laptops, game consoles(PS5/PS4/PS3, Xbox One/360), set-top Andriod TV boxes, 4K Blu-ray player, DVD, UHD HDTV, HDMI ARC enabled soundbars, projector, monitor, display, etc. Get 4K UHD, HDR images with UGREEN 4K HDMI 2.0 Cable
